verses.verse: And all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265> from the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin,<WH5512> after their journeys,<WH4550> according<WH5921> to the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> and pitched<WH2583> in Rephidim:<WH7508> and there was no<WH369> water<WH4325> for the people<WH5971> to drink.<WH8354>

Why the people<WH5971> did chide<WH7378> with Moses,<WH4872> and said,<WH559> Give<WH5414> us water<WH4325> that we may drink.<WH8354> And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, Why<WH4100> chide<WH7378> you with me? why<WH4100> do you tempt<WH5254> the LORD?<WH3068>

And the people<WH5971> thirsted<WH6770> there<WH8033> for water;<WH4325> and the people<WH5971> murmured<WH3885> against<WH5921> Moses,<WH4872> and said,<WH559> Why<WH4100> is this<WH2088> that you have brought<WH5927> us up out of Egypt,<WH4714> to kill<WH4191> us and our children<WH1121> and our cattle<WH4735> with thirst?<WH6772>
And Moses<WH4872> cried<WH6817> to the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> shall I do<WH6213> to this<WH2088> people?<WH5971> they be almost<WH4592> ready<WH5750> to stone<WH5619> me.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Go<WH5674> on before<WH6440> the people,<WH5971> and take<WH3947> with you of the elders<WH2205> of Israel;<WH3478> and your rod,<WH4294> with which<WH834> you smote<WH5221> the river,<WH2975> take<WH3947> in your hand,<WH3027> and go.<WH1980>

Behold,<WH2005> I will stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you there<WH8033> on the rock<WH6697> in Horeb;<WH2722> and you shall smite<WH5221> the rock,<WH6697> and there shall come<WH3318> water<WH4325> out of it, that the people<WH5971> may drink.<WH8354> And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> so<WH3651> in the sight<WH5869> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel.<WH3478>

And he called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> Massah,<WH4532> and Meribah,<WH4809> because<WH5921> of the chiding<WH7379> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and because<WH5921> they tempted<WH5254> the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> Is the LORD<WH3068> among<WH7130> us, or not?
Then came<WH935> Amalek,<WH6002> and fought<WH3898> with Israel<WH3478> in Rephidim.<WH7508>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> Choose<WH977> us out men,<WH582> and go<WH3318> out, fight<WH3898> with Amalek:<WH6002> to morrow<WH4279> I will stand<WH5324> on<WH5921> the top<WH7218> of the hill<WH1389> with the rod<WH4294> of God<WH430> in my hand.<WH3027>

So Joshua<WH3091> did<WH6213> as Moses<WH4872> had said<WH559> to him, and fought<WH3898> with Amalek:<WH6002> and Moses,<WH4872> Aaron,<WH175> and Hur<WH2354> went<WH5927> up to the top<WH7218> of the hill.<WH1389>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH834> Moses<WH4872> held<WH7311> up his hand,<WH3027> that Israel<WH3478> prevailed:<WH1396> and when<WH834> he let<WH5117> down<WH5117> his hand,<WH3027> Amalek<WH6002> prevailed.<WH1396>

But Moses <WH4872>hands<WH3027> were heavy;<WH3515> and they took<WH3947> a stone,<WH68> and put<WH7760> it under<WH8478> him, and he sat<WH3427> thereon;<WH5921> and Aaron<WH175> and Hur<WH2354> stayed<WH8551> up his hands,<WH3027> the one<WH2088> on the one<WH2088> side, and the other<WH259> on the other<WH2088> side; and his hands<WH3027> were steady<WH530> until<WH5704> the going<WH935> down<WH935> of the sun.<WH8121>
And Joshua<WH3091> discomfited<WH2522> Amalek<WH6002> and his people<WH5971> with the edge<WH5310> of the sword.<WH2719>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Write<WH3789> this<WH2063> for a memorial<WH2146> in a book,<WH5612> and rehearse<WH7760> it in the ears<WH241> of Joshua:<WH3091> for I will utterly put<WH4229> out the remembrance<WH2143> of Amalek<WH6002> from under<WH8478> heaven.<WH8064>
And Moses<WH4872> built<WH1129> an altar,<WH4196> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of it Jehovahnissi:<WH3071>
For he said,<WH559> Because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> has sworn<WH3027> that the LORD<WH3068> will have war<WH4421> with Amalek<WH6002> from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755>
